    • Method Detail

      • getFlights

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFlights(@HeaderParam(value="Authorization")
                                   java.lang.String authorization,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="X-Filter")
                                   java.lang.String filter,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="X-Base")
                                   java.lang.String b,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="X-Offset")
                                   java.lang.String of,
                                   @HeaderParam(value="X-Order")
                                   java.lang.String order)
        API method to get all flights. [server]/flight/
        Parameters:
        authorization - authorization string
        filter - date filter, in example: dateOfDepartureFrom=2013-02-27T02:04:46+01:00,dateOfDepartureTo=2013-02-27T03:04:46+01:00
        b - base, count of selected data
        of - offset of selected data
        order - two part string: 'column:[asc|desc]'
        Returns:
        Response

        Parameters:
        authorization - authorization string
        id - identificator of the flight
        Returns:
        Response
